forumNotes.author: seyiisq
forumNotes.content:
Hi all,  

I have a netbook without a cd drive which i am working on. I am trying to install winxp on it for the first time.  

During installation, i did something silly by removing the usb flash drive mistakenly, while the setup was formatting the hard drive.   

I tried to re-start the installation but now i am getting an "error loading operating system" message.  

Pls can anyone help.
